name: Adobe Sound Document
summary: Learn about .ASND files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ASND files are commonly used for editing sound clips and applying sound effects before importing audio into videos. ASND files allow users to save multiple groups of edit settings within the same document.
NOTE: Adobe SoundBooth was replaced by Adobe Audition in 2011.

description: File created by Adobe SoundBooth, a program used for audio editing; contains the original audio files, audio edits, effects, and other audio settings; can store nondestructive modifications to audio clips.
